title: [QUESTION] OSS licenses
body:
Hi.

I'd like to know if you are aware and if you know how to deal with the following:
SkiaSharp, that has a MIT license, use HarfBuzz that has a Old-MIT license. HarfBuzz use several components (Cairo, FreeType2, GLib, google-benchmark, Ragel). Some of them are LGPL-2.1 but the last one, Ragel, is GNU GPL.
In a commercial product how do you deal with this situation? 
Some tips are welcome.
